tinytiger 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Download TIGER shapes for Polygon Faces

Source: R/polygon_faces.R
tt_polygon_faces.Rd

Download TIGER shapes for Polygon Faces

Usage

tt_polygon_faces(state, county, year = 2021)

Arguments

state

FIPs, postal codes, or full name of states.

county

FIPs codes or full name of counties. Optional.

year

Integer year. Required. Years < 2012 are not currently supported.

Value

sf data.frame

Examples

tt_polygon_faces('DE', county = '001')
#> Simple feature collection with 6604 features and 44 fields
